title: Policy Research Intern
description: Conduct research on public policy issues and analyze government regulations. Assist in preparing policy briefs and impact assessment reports. Learn about stakeholder engagement and help organize policy consultation meetings.

title: Government Relations Intern
description: Support public affairs activities and stakeholder engagement with government agencies. Assist in policy advocacy and regulatory compliance monitoring. Learn about legislative processes and government communication strategies.

title: Public Administration Intern
description: Support municipal administration and citizen service delivery programs. Assist in e-governance initiatives and digital service implementations. Learn about public procurement processes and administrative procedures.

title: Social Impact Intern
description: Work on community development programs and social welfare initiatives. Support NGO operations and volunteer coordination activities. Assist in impact measurement and program evaluation for social projects.

title: Urban Planning Intern
description: Support city planning projects and infrastructure development initiatives. Assist in traffic management studies and public transportation planning. Learn about smart city technologies and urban sustainability practices.

title: Legal Research Intern
description: Conduct legal research and assist in preparing legal briefs and case documentation. Support regulatory analysis and compliance assessments. Learn about constitutional law and administrative legal procedures.
